Description: An exciting and a professional role , which involves meeting with property owners and prospective and clients, scheduling property viewings and prospecting properties for clients to secure financial transactions.We offer:- A generous commission pay structure with unlimited earning potential.- Excellent platform and 'on-going' 1 month training to embark your real estate career.- Access to lead generation system and maximum exposure on all property portals.- Employment visa, RERA training and commission incentives.- Area Specialist Focus to gain competitive advantage.B - Key Duties- Prepare a daily action plan and set regular targets.- Generate new property listings via networking, site-visits and regular meetings and cold-calls.- Schedule property viewings with potential clients and take notes on client requirements andfollow up.- Follow proper documentation on all transactions and ensure full compliance of Laws andRegulations and Company Policies.- Understand client requirements, and present several options to buyers/tenants for their propertysearch to short-list properties and finalise the deal.- Provide honest feedback to clients and promote ethics and integrity on all transactions.Skills
Skills: - A highly motivated individual who is self disciplined and has 'passion' for real estate.
- Excellent Time- Management and organisational skills
- Communicate clearly and effectively with clients.
- Well versed in English (Verbal and Written)
- Several years of verified sales experience
